details: Clostech is an Argentinian startup that leverages artificial intelligence to let users preview how different garments would look on them by uploading a photo before purchasing.
responsibilities: Contributed as part of the front-end team, developing, designing, and maintaining web applications using React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS.
Implemented usability improvements, responsive design adjustments, and built scalable components to optimize the user experience.

details: Intensive training on the Salesforce platform with a focus on the insurance domain. Developed an insurance system for musical instruments using Apex and native Salesforce tools, including business logic, backend, and frontend components in a team environment.
responsibilities: Collaborated on defining the data flow architecture and integrating different modules within the Salesforce ecosystem.
Designed and implemented features for an insurance solution, applying theoretical concepts to a real-world team project.
